00042 // Underlying CCelFileData class expects backslashes rather than forward slashes on Windows hmmmm
00043 const string testFiles[] = 
00044 {
00045         "doesnt_exist.CHP",                                                                                                             // file does not exist - for testing when a file does not exist
00046         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a.CHP",
00047         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/pcwrs041a_pd01.CHP",
00048         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/NA02705_00243_01_3001197.CHP",
00049         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/10k_1.CHP",
00050         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_stat.CHP",
00051         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_v_T2_r1_stat.CHP",
00052         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/DCN_01_xda.CHP",
00053         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a-test_rel.CHP",
00054         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData_baseline.CHP",
00055         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData.CHP",
00056         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/PLIERdata1.CHP"
00057 };
00058 const int FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT = 11; // does not count the does not exist file case because we do not explicitly test it
00059 
00060 const int DOES_NOT_EXIST = 0;   // index into the file name array above of the file does not exist name
00061 
00062 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION(FusionCHPDataGCOSTest);

00064 // has to be called before each test
00065 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::setUp()
00066 {
00067 }
00068 
00069 // has to be called after each test
00070 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::tearDown()
00071 {
00072 }
00073 
00074 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::TestFileId()
00075 {
00076         if (FileUtils::Exists(testFiles[5].c_str()) == true)
00077         {
00078                 FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(testFiles[5]);
00079                 FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00080                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->FileId() == "");
00081                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenericData() == NULL);
00082         }
00083 }

00089         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Create fusion object!",fusionChp);
00090         //delete fusionChp;

00093 // main test entry method, calls the rest.
00094 // had to do it this way, because CPPUINT will not accept test method parameters
00095 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::TestAll()
00096 {
00097         // loop over each chp file to test
00098         for(int i = 1; i < FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT; ++i)
00099         {
00100                 string fileName = testFiles[i];
00101                 if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName.c_str()) == false)
00102                         continue;
00103                 CreationTest(fileName);
00104                 tearDown();
00105                 setUp();
00106                 ReadHeaderTest(fileName);
00107                 tearDown();
00108                 setUp();
00109                 RowsColsTest(fileName);
00110                 tearDown();
00111                 setUp();
00112                 VersionTest(fileName);
00113                 tearDown();
00114                 setUp();
00115                 AlgorithmNameAndVersionTest(fileName);
00116                 tearDown();
00117                 setUp();
00118                 ChipTypeTest(fileName);
00119                 tearDown();
00120                 setUp();
00121                 ParentCelFileName(fileName);
00122                 tearDown();
00123                 setUp();
00124                 ProgIDTest(fileName);
00125                 tearDown();
00126                 setUp();
00127                 AlgParamsTest(fileName);
00128                 tearDown();
00129                 setUp();
00130                 SummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00131                 tearDown();
00132                 setUp();
00133                 NumberOfSetsTest(fileName);
00134                 tearDown();
00135                 setUp();
00136                 ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(fileName);
00137                 tearDown();
00138                 setUp();
00139                 ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00140                 tearDown();
00141                 setUp();
00142                 ReadTest(fileName);
00143                 tearDown();
00144                 setUp();
00145                 CallMethodsWhenObjectIsNotReadyTest(fileName);
00146                 tearDown();
00147                 setUp();
00148                 DataCompareTest(fileName);
00149                 tearDown();
00150                 setUp();
00151                 BackgroundDataTest(fileName);
00152         }
00153 }

00155 // test that we can read the chp header information
00156 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::ReadHeaderTest(string fileName)
00157 {
00158         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00159         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00161         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00162 
00163         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00165         delete fusionChp;
00166 }

00168 // test the rows and colums
00169 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::RowsColsTest(string fileName)
00170 {
00171         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00172         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00173         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00174         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00176         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # rows!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetRows());
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # cols!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetCols());
00179         delete fusionChp;
00180 }

00195 // test the algorithm and alg. verion info
00196 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::AlgorithmNameAndVersionTest(string fileName)
00197 {
00198         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00199         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00200         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00201         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00202         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00204         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg name!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetAlgName()));
00205         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg version!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgVersion() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetAlgVersion()));
00206         delete fusionChp;

00248 // test the algorithm params
00249 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::AlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00250 {
00251         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00252         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00254         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00255         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00257 
00258     FusionTagValuePairTypeList algParamsFusion;
00259     fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(algParamsFusion);
00260     FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = algParamsFusion.begin();
00261     FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = algParamsFusion.end();
00262 
00263         TagValuePairTypeList& algParamsGCOS = gcosChp.GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters();
00264         TagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginGCOS = algParamsGCOS.begin(), endGCOS = algParamsGCOS.end();
00265 
00266         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg count",fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameterCount() == gcosChp.GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters().size());
00267 
00268         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00269         theFusionMap map;
00270 
00271         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00272         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00273         {
00274                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00275         }
00276 
00277         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00278         for(; beginGCOS != endGCOS; beginGCOS++)
00279         {
00280                 // test single alg value call
00281                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Algorithm Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Tag).c_str()) == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Value));
00282 
00283                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00284                 // with what was retrieved by the gcos api
00285                 findIt = map.find(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Tag));
00286                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00287                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Value));
00288         }
00289         delete fusionChp;
00290 }
00291 
00292 // tests the summary params
00293 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::SummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00294 {
00295         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00296         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00297         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00298         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00299         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00300         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00301 
00302     FusionTagValuePairTypeList sumParamsFusion;
00303     fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(sumParamsFusion);
00304     FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = sumParamsFusion.begin();
00305     FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = sumParamsFusion.end();
00306 
00307         TagValuePairTypeList& sumParamsGCOS = gcosChp.GetHeader().SummaryParameters();
00308         TagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginGCOS = sumParamsGCOS.begin(), endGCOS = sumParamsGCOS.end();
00309 
00310         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - sum count",fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameterCount() == gcosChp.GetHeader().SummaryParameters().size());
00311 
00312         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00313         theFusionMap map;
00314 
00315         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00316         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00317         {
00318                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00319         }
00320 
00321         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00322         for(; beginGCOS != endGCOS; beginGCOS++)
00323         {
00324                 // test single alg value call
00325                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Summary Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Tag).c_str()) == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Value));
00326 
00327                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00328                 // with what was retrieved by the gcos api
00329                 findIt = map.find(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Tag));
00330                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00331                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(beginGCOS->Value));
00332         }
00333         delete fusionChp;
00334 }

00350 // tests the algorithm parameters
00351 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00352 {
00353         // read the header with the fusion api
00354         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00355         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00356         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00357 
00358         // read the header with the gcos api
00359         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00360         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00361         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00362 
00363         // get the gcos list
00364         TagValuePairTypeList listGCOS = gcosChp.GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters();
00365         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00366         // get the fusion list
00367         fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(listFusion);
00368 
00369         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure gcos file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00370         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg param count",listFusion.size() == listGCOS.size());
00371 
00372         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure gcos api and the fusion are the same
00373         // first we get the interators for the loop
00374         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator begin = listFusion.begin();
00375         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator end = listFusion.end();
00376 
00377         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getalgorithmparameter call
00378         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion algorithm list retrieved
00379         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual alg params api for both.
00380         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00381         // the get alg parameter calls
00382         for (; begin != end; begin++)
00383         {
00384                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00385                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(begin->Tag.c_str());
00386                 // get the gcos value for the parameter name
00387                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00388                 wstring tempGCOS = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(begin->Tag).c_str()));
00389 
00390                 // double check that the value from the fusion list is the same as the other values retieved from the get alg params calls
00391                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params",tempFusion == tempGCOS && begin->Value == tempGCOS);
00392         }
00393         delete fusionChp;
00394 }
00395 
00396 // tests the summary parameters
00397 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00398 {
00399         // read the header with the fusion api
00400         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00401         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00402         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00403 
00404         // read the header with the gcos api
00405         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00406         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00407         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00408 
00409         // get the gcos list
00410         TagValuePairTypeList listGCOS = gcosChp.GetHeader().SummaryParameters();
00411         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00412         // get the fusion list
00413         fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(listFusion);
00414 
00415         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure gcos file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00416         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - param list count",listFusion.size() == listGCOS.size());
00417 
00418         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure gcos api and the fusion are the same
00419         // first we get the interators for the loop
00420         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator begin = listFusion.begin();
00421         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator end = listFusion.end();
00422 
00423         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getsummaryparameter call
00424         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion summary list retrieved
00425         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual summary params api for both.
00426         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00427         // the get summary parameter calls
00428         for (; begin != end; begin++)
00429         {
00430                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00431                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(begin->Tag.c_str());
00432                 // get the gcos value for the parameter name
00433                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00434                 wstring tempGCOS = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(begin->Tag).c_str()));
00435 
00436                 // double check that the value from the fusion list is the same as the other values retieved from the get summary params calls
00437                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params",tempFusion == tempGCOS && begin->Value == tempGCOS);
00438         }
00439         delete fusionChp;
00440 }
00441 
00442 // test the read method of fusion. This differs only from previous readheader tests in that instead of readheader being called
00443 // read is called.
00444 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::ReadTest(string fileName)
00445 {
00446         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00447         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00448         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00449 
00450         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00451         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00452         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00453 
00454         // Check some header values
00455         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetVersion() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetVersionNumber());
00456         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - cols",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetCols());
00457         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - rows",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetRows());
00458         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets() == gcosChp.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets());
00459         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetAlgName()));
00460     CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgVersion() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetAlgVersion()));
00461         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - chip type",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetChipType() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetChipType()));
00462         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - parent cell name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetParentCellFile() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetParentCellFile()));
00463         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - prog id",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetProgID() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosChp.GetHeader().GetProgID()));
00464         delete fusionChp;
00465 }
00466 
00467 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::CallMethodsWhenObjectIsNotReadyTest(string fileName)
00468 {
00469    // the idea here is that without performing the set file name and without calling the readxxx methods
00470     // any of the following calls shall throw an exception.
00471     
00472  //////////   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(fusionChp->ReadHeader(), FileNotOpenException);
00473 
00474         //////////CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(fusionChp->GetHeader(), FileNotOpenException);
00475         //////////CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows(), FileNotOpenException);
00476         //////////CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols(), FileNotOpenException);
00477         //////////CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows(), FileNotOpenException);
00478 }
00479 
00480 // tests the main data of the chp file
00481 // currently supports expression, genotyping, universal, and soon resequencing
00482 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::DataCompareTest(string fileName)
00483 {
00484         // here we compare the data contents with both the gcos reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00485         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00486         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00487         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00488 
00489         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00490         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00491         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read!", gcosChp.Read());
00492 
00493         CExpressionProbeSetResults resultsGCOSExpression;
00494         FusionExpressionProbeSetResults resultsFusionExpression;
00495 
00496         CGenotypeProbeSetResults resultsGCOSGeno;
00497         FusionGenotypeProbeSetResults resultsFusionGeno;
00498 
00499         CUniversalProbeSetResults resultsGCOSUni;
00500         FusionUniversalProbeSetResults resultsFusionUni;
00501 
00502         u_int32_t count = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets(); 
00503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",count == (u_int32_t)gcosChp.GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets());
00504 
00505 
00506         if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionExpression)
00507         {
00508                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00509                 // loop over the number of probesets
00510                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00511                 {
00512                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetExpressionResults(i, resultsFusionExpression));
00513                         resultsGCOSExpression = *gcosChp.GetExpressionResults((int)i);
00514                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - DetectionPValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionPValue() == resultsGCOSExpression.DetectionPValue);
00515                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignal() == resultsGCOSExpression.Signal);
00516                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumPairs() == resultsGCOSExpression.NumPairs);
00517                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumUsedPairs() == resultsGCOSExpression.NumUsedPairs);
00518                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Detection",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetection() == resultsGCOSExpression.Detection);
00519                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - m_HasCompResults",resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults() == resultsGCOSExpression.m_HasCompResults);
00520                         if (resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults())
00521                         {
00522                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - ChangePValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangePValue() == resultsGCOSExpression.ChangePValue);
00523                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatio",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatio() == resultsGCOSExpression.SignalLogRatio);
00524                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioLow",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioLow() == resultsGCOSExpression.SignalLogRatioLow);
00525                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioHigh",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioHigh() == resultsGCOSExpression.SignalLogRatioHigh);
00526                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumCommonPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumCommonPairs() == resultsGCOSExpression.NumCommonPairs);
00527                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Change",resultsFusionExpression.GetChange() == resultsGCOSExpression.Change);
00528                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetDetectionString",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionString() == resultsGCOSExpression.GetDetectionString());
00529                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangeString() == resultsGCOSExpression.GetChangeString());
00530                         }
00531                 }
00532         }
00533         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionGenotyping)
00534         {
00535                 // for genotyping, we have a special case
00536                 // for 10k we only check curtain parameters are checked and in 100K other are checked.
00537                 // because we are not guaranteed to have properly initialized data from the files, we 
00538                 // have to make checks against the algorithm names.
00539                 // there are currently two.
00540                 // if there are any algs added in the future, we will need to update this else if to include it.
00541                 bool bWholeGenenome = false, bDynamicModel = false;
00542 
00543                 if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"WholeGenome")
00544                 {
00545                         bWholeGenenome = true;
00546                 }
00547                 else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"DynamicModel")
00548                 {
00549                         bDynamicModel = true;
00550                 }
00551 
00552                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00553                 // loop over the number of probesets
00554                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00555                 {
00556                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenotypingResults(i, resultsFusionGeno));
00557                         resultsGCOSGeno = *gcosChp.GetGenotypingResults((int)i);
00558                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCall() == resultsGCOSGeno.AlleleCall);
00559                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Confidence",resultsFusionGeno.GetConfidence() == resultsGCOSGeno.Confidence);
00560                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCallString",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCallString() == resultsGCOSGeno.GetAlleleCallString());
00561 
00562                         if(bWholeGenenome)
00563                         {
00564                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS1",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS1() == resultsGCOSGeno.RAS1);
00565                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS2",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS2() == resultsGCOSGeno.RAS2);
00566                         }
00567                         else if(bDynamicModel)
00568                         {
00569                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AA",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAA() == resultsGCOSGeno.pvalue_AA);
00570                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAB() == resultsGCOSGeno.pvalue_AB);
00571                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_BB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueBB() == resultsGCOSGeno.pvalue_BB);
00572                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_NoCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueNoCall() == resultsGCOSGeno.pvalue_NoCall);
00573                         }
00574                 }
00575         }
00576         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionUniversal)
00577         {
00578                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00579                 // loop over the number of probesets
00580                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00581                 {
00582                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetUniversalResults(i, resultsFusionUni));
00583                         resultsGCOSUni = *gcosChp.GetUniversalResults((int)i);
00584                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Background",resultsFusionUni.GetBackground() == resultsGCOSUni.GetBackground());
00585                 }
00586         }
00587         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionResequencing)
00588         {
00589                 FusionResequencingResults fusionResults;
00590                 fusionChp->GetReseqResults(fusionResults);
00591                 CResequencingResults *gcosResults = gcosChp.GetResequencingResults();
00592 
00593                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize() == gcosResults->GetCalledBasesSize());
00594                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetScoresSize() == gcosResults->GetScoresSize());
00595                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize() == gcosResults->GetForceCallsSize());
00596                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize() == gcosResults->GetOrigCallsSize());
00597 
00598                 const Int8Vector &fusionCalls = fusionResults.GetCalledBases();
00599                 const FloatVector &fusionScores = fusionResults.GetScores();
00600                 const std::vector<char> &gcosCalls = gcosResults->GetCalledBases();
00601                 const FloatVector &gcosScores = gcosResults->GetScores();
00602 
00603                 int sz = fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize();
00604                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00605                 {
00606                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBase(i) == gcosResults->GetCalledBase(i));
00607                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetScore(i) == gcosResults->GetScore(i));
00608                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionCalls[i] == gcosCalls[i]);
00609                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionScores[i] == gcosScores[i]);
00610                 }
00611 
00612                 ForceCallType gcosForce;
00613                 FusionForceCallType fusionForce;
00614                 const FusionForceCallVector& fusionForces = fusionResults.GetForceCalls();
00615                 const std::vector<ForceCallType>& gcosForces = gcosResults->GetForceCalls();
00616 
00617                 sz = fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize();
00618                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00619                 {
00620                         fusionForce = fusionResults.GetForceCall(i);
00621                         gcosForce = gcosResults->GetForceCall(i);
00622 
00623                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetPosition() == gcosForce.position);
00624                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetCall() == gcosForce.call);
00625                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetReason() == gcosForce.reason);
00626 
00627                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetPosition() == gcosForces[i].position);
00628                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetCall() == gcosForces[i].call);
00629                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetReason() == gcosForces[i].reason);
00630                 }
00631 
00632                 BaseCallType gcosOrig;
00633                 FusionBaseCallType fusionOrig;
00634                 const FusionBaseCallVector& fusionOrigs = fusionResults.GetOrigCalls();
00635                 const std::vector<BaseCallType>& gcosOrigs = gcosResults->GetOrigCalls();
00636 
00637                 sz = fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize();
00638                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00639                 {
00640                         fusionOrig = fusionResults.GetOrigCall(i);
00641                         gcosOrig = gcosResults->GetOrigCall(i);
00642 
00643                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetPosition() == gcosOrig.position);
00644                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetCall() == gcosOrig.call);
00645 
00646                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetPosition() == gcosOrigs[i].position);
00647                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetCall() == gcosOrigs[i].call);
00648                 }
00649         }
00650         delete fusionChp;
00651 }
00652 
00653 // tests the background data for the chp file. This tests the backgroundzones, backgroundinfo and backgroundtype for each zone
00654 void FusionCHPDataGCOSTest::BackgroundDataTest(string fileName)
00655 {
00656         CPPUNIT_ADDITIONALMESSAGE_H
00657         // here we compare the background data contents with both the gcos reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00658         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00659         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00660         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00661 
00662         CCHPFileData gcosChp;
00663         gcosChp.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00664         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Read header!", gcosChp.ReadHeader() == true);
00665 
00666         BackgroundZoneInfo zoneInfoFusion;
00667         fusionChp->GetHeader().GetBackgroundZoneInfo(zoneInfoFusion);
00668         BackgroundZoneInfo zoneInfoGCOS = gcosChp.GetHeader().GetBackgroundZoneInfo();
00669 
00670         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - number_zones",zoneInfoFusion.number_zones == zoneInfoGCOS.number_zones);
00671         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - smooth_factor",zoneInfoFusion.smooth_factor == zoneInfoGCOS.smooth_factor);
00672         BackgroundZoneTypeList zonesFusion = zoneInfoFusion.zones;
00673         BackgroundZoneTypeList zonesGCOS = zoneInfoGCOS.zones;
00674 
00675         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",zonesFusion.size() == zonesGCOS.size());
00676 
00677         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator beginFusion = zonesFusion.begin(), endFusion = zonesFusion.end();
00678         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator beginGCOS = zonesGCOS.begin(), endGCOS = zonesGCOS.end();
00679 
00680         for(; beginFusion != endFusion && beginGCOS != endGCOS; beginFusion++, beginGCOS++)
00681         {
00682                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centerx",beginFusion->centerx == beginGCOS->centerx);
00683                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centery",beginFusion->centery == beginGCOS->centery);
00684                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - background",beginFusion->background == beginGCOS->background);
00685         }
00686         delete fusionChp;
00687 }
